Sentencas: Perovskites of the ABO(3) type, such as LaMnO3, can be used as air electrodes in solid oxide fuel cells and electrolyzers.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: Their properties can be tuned by A- and B-site substitutions.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The influence of La substitution by Ca on the oxygen nonstoichiometry has been investigated frequently, but the results depend highly on the synthesis and atmospheric conditions.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: In this work, a series of La1-xCaxMnO3+delta (x = 0-0.5) was synthesized using conventional solid-state synthesis under an air atmosphere.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The structures of the materials were studied in detail with powder X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The initial oxygen nonstoichiometries were determined using thermo-gravimetric reduction.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The samples were subsequently analyzed in terms of defect chemistry in dependence of temperature, atmosphere, and Ca content via thermogravimetric analysis.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The changes in the manganese charge states were investigated by X-ray absorption near-edge spectroscopy experiments.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ

Sentencas: The influence of intrinsic and extrinsic effects on the Mn-valence state of the differently Ca-substituted samples as calculated from thermogravimetric analysis and as determined directly from X-ray absorption near-edge spectroscopy is presented.
Titulo: Oxygen Nonstoichiometry and Valence State of Manganese in La1-xCaxMnO3+δ
